pullRequest.title: `hive_engine_version` options for `td` operators
pullRequest.bodyText:
We manage dig file which includes a lot of td operators and some jobs should be run by presto others should be hive.
We want to define engine_version of hive on only one place by using _export: and td:.
In such case engine_version is not enough because we need to switch engine_version value based on query engine.
Introducing hive_engine_version option reduces our management cost of engine_versions.

nodes.bodyText: Can you describe the priority order of existing engine_version and this one?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -277,6 +277,28 @@ When you set those parameters, use [digdag secrets command](https://docs.digdag.
   engine_version: stable
   ```
 
+* **hive_engine_version**: NAME
+
+  Specify engine version for Hive.
+
+  Examples:
+
+  ```
+  engine: hive
+  hive_engine_version: stable

@@ -277,6 +277,28 @@ When you set those parameters, use [digdag secrets command](https://docs.digdag.
   engine_version: stable
   ```
 
+* **hive_engine_version**: NAME
+
+  Specify engine version for Hive.
+
+  Examples:
+
+  ```
+  engine: hive
+  hive_engine_version: stable
+  ```
+
+* **presto_engine_version**: NAME

nodes.bodyText: How about adding engine_version to check the new parameter expectedly overrides it?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -101,6 +101,56 @@ public void testTDJobRequestParamsWithEngineVersion()
         assertEquals("stable", jobRequest.getEngineVersion().get().toString());
     }
 
+    @Test
+    public void testTDJobRequestParamsWithHiveEngineVersion()
+            throws Exception
+    {
+        Path projectPath = Paths.get("").normalize().toAbsolutePath();
+
+        Config config = newConfig()
+                .set("database", "testdb")
+                .set("query", "select 1")
+                .set("engine", "hive")
+                .set("hive_engine_version", "stable")

commit.message:
`hive_engine_version` option for `td` operator

We manage dig file which includes a lot of `td` operators
and some jobs should be run by presto others should be hive.
We want to define engine_version of hive on only one place by using `_export:` and `td:`.
In such case `engine_version` is not enough because we need to switch
engine_version value based on query engine.
Introducing `hive_engine_version` option reduces our management cost of engine_versions.

beforeCommit.message:
Remove `presto_engine_version`

Because we can not control presto engine_version via API job
creation endpoint now.
